Name: Keyboard Piano-ist
About the game: Play Piano and learn typing at the same time! Discover your inner piano talent. Improve your hand-eye coordination and reaction speed. Get better at concentrating and muscle memory retention. Train your fingers and get better at typing by improving speed and accuracy. Education and Entertainment, Edu-tainment, is way more fun and efficient for learning! If you are using a Razer Chroma compatible keyboard, the keyboard keys would light up accordingly to the notes! Play the game, learn the piano!
